snippet: "Get It Out There: Comedy by BAM & IFC," a free monthly comedy showcase, will make its debut at the BAMcafé in Brooklyn on April 25.
abstract: "Get It Out There: Comedy by BAM & IFC," a free monthly comedy showcase, will make its debut at the BAMcafé in Brooklyn on April 25.

headline.main: BAM and IFC Collaborating on New Comedy Showcase
headline.print_headline: BAM and IFC Join In Comedy Showcase
